0.name: The rope to the Pyramid
desc: "   The rope stretches upwards to the pyramid.  However you notice as
you climb that it seems to be fraying.  Any further progress would be
surely fatal, until someone fixes the rope.

exits.desc: You can see the floor of the desert

1.name: Sarcophagi of Akinra
desc: You have entered a secret passage that leads down to a solemn chamber.
Here lies the great coffin of Akinra!

2.name: Altar of The Sun God Ra
desc: A colourful altar dominates the center of this shrine. Paintings surround
you paying homage to the great god Ra. A huge statue of the once omnipotent
Pharaoh Akinra looms over a dias behind the altar. Hieroglyphic etchings
cover the sandstone floor.
A spiral stairway leads down.
Unfortunately you can't read ancient Egyptian.... however a faded ink
translation, apparently left by the owners of the grappling hook, is here.
Great was the reign of Akinra. The ... God brought his empire much
... and power. Since you are reading these writings you have already
desecrated the ... of this holy place. So be warned: Leave now or be
forever cursed. The greatest riches and relics of Akinra lay ... his tomb
to be reclaimed in his ... reign. The Guardians of Akinra are not to be
trifled with and will protect the tomb fiercely. Suffer defeat and ...

3.name: West face of Pyramid
desc: Winds test your footing as you stand here. A Sphinx facing east hasn't noticed
your presence nor that of a grappling hook under its left paw. There is just
room enough for you to stand on the ledge and walk around the sides. Someone
has gained entrance to the tomb by removing some stones near his tail.

exits.desc: You see the rope stretch over the edge

4.name: Tomb of King Akinra
desc: This is the tomb of the Great One. A cold feeling of death intrudes upon
your being. Looking down the vaulted chamber you see a huge sarcophagus
bearing the likeness of Akinra. Statues of kneeling worshipers face his
tomb. You notice the bones of some daring adventurers, less fortunate
than you hope to be. One still grasps an ink pen in his right hand.
Passages lead off in all directions.
After brushing off some fo the dust, a sapphire bracelet becomes visible
engraved on the side of the coffin.

extra.desc: Someone or something has magically blocked your way up.

desc: You see a door here with no apparent keyhole.
I trust you have a mage or thief with you.

exits.desc: Something or someone has magically blocked your way
You see a VERY long drop down.

6.name: Preperation room
desc: This is one of the side rooms off of the tomb chamber.
A table stands here covered with the tools of mummification.

7.name: The rope to the Pyramid
desc: You have a good view from up here, hope you aren't afraid of heights. The
rope continues up disappearing over a ledge. Looking over your shoulder
you see the vast expanses of the desert stretching off to the horizon. Evil
permeates the stones of the Pyramid.
The rope continues up and trails off below.

8.name: Treasure room
8.desc: Many of Akinra's most prized possessions lie here in ornately carved chests.

9.name: Passage to Tomb
desc: This is a side room off of the main tomb chamber.
A spiral staircase leads down into darkness.

10.name: Storage room
desc: This room is filled with religious artefacts... candles, robes, incense,
and small stone daggers (too small to be useful).

11.name: Corridor
desc: A mural of mosaic tiles line the walls depicting the empire of Akinra at
its height of power.
Passages lead east west and south.

12.name: East face of Pyramid
desc: Sand, sand, and more sand... off into the distance you see a sandstorm.
Is it heading this way ?

exits.desc: You see a VERY long drop down.

13.name: South face of Pyramid
desc: Heat beats down upon you. Looking out across the desert you see the ruins
of a once great city to the south-west.

exits.desc: You see a VERY long drop down.

14.name: Guardian's Room
desc: This room appears to have one purpose, to house the Stone Golem standing
here. His last action seems to have been grasping a stone key.

15.name: West Corridor
desc: The corridor ends here. There are doors to the north and south, the
corridor leaves east.

16.name: Guardian's Room
16.desc: This room is nondescript, save the clay spattered on the ground.

17.name: Guardian's Room
desc: This room pales in comparison to the others. The only noteworthy item
here is the HUGE chair... and the golem sitting in it. He stands
at your entrance.

18.name: East Corridor
18.desc: The corridor ends here with doors to the north and south.

exits.desc: you see a large iron gate to the south.

19.name: Room of Anubis
desc: You have entered an ornately gilded throne room. Sitting upon the giant
throne is the mighty figure of Anubis, wearing a glowing key on a chain
about his neck.

20.name: Culdesac
desc: The murals continue into this room, but tell a different story.
They show images of death and pain as demonic beings cruelly torture
Egyptian heroes. The passage way ends and along the floor you notice
an iron door set into the ground. The image of a horned devil adornes
the handle.
The only other way is north to the chamber.
The iron door looks unopenable without the proper key.
The eyes of the horned devil glow slightly.

21.name: Maze ?
21.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

exits.desc: The maze is very twisty here... your not sure where this leads to.

22.name: Maze ?
22.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

23.name: Maze ?
23.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

desc: The maze continues here. You hear faint chanting and the sounds of
slithering.

24.name: Maze ?
24.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

25.name: Maze ?
25.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

exits.desc: The maze continues here. You hear a low guttural moaning from this direction.

26.name: Maze ?
26.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

exits.desc: The maze continues to the east.
The maze continues to the south.

27.name: Maze ?
27.desc: a bunch of twisty passages that all look alike.

28.name: Maze ?
28.desc: A bunch of twisty passages that all look alike.

29.name: Maze ?
29.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

30.name: Maze ?
30.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

31.name: Dead End.
desc: This corridor ends here, but a lonely Spectre looks up as you enter. He
is carrying a sapphire bracelet. He looks into your eyes almost as if too
say, "I'm sorry, but I have to kill you.

32.name: Maze ?
32.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

exits.desc: The maze continues to the north.
The maze continues to the south.

33.name: Maze ?
33.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

34.name: Maze ?
desc: You have entered the King's Labyrinth. Passages lead off in all
directions. You think you hear movement nearby.

35.name: Maze ?
35.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

36.name: Maze ?
36.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

37.name: Maze ?
37.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

38.name: Maze ?
38.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

exits.desc: The maze continues to the north.
The maze continues to the south. You hear faint sounds from this direction.

39.name: Maze ?
39.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

40.name: Maze ?
40.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

41.name: Maze ?
41.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

42.name: Maze ?
42.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

43.name: Maze ?
43.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

44.name: Maze ?
desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike. You think you might hear
the sound of blowing wind from below.

exits.desc: The maze continues to the north.

45.name: Maze ?
45.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

46.name: Maze ?
46.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

47.name: Maze ?
47.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

48.name: Maze ?
48.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

49.name: Maze ?
49.desc: A maze of twisty passages that all look alike.

50.name: Outside Redferne's residence
desc: A huge cloud forms the plateau on which you are now standing. The wind here
is absolutely quiet and the sun is shining warmly upon you. From under the
cloud you can hear the faint sounds of Midgaard. Right before you to the
north lies the grand Mansion of Naris, the residence of the Greater God
Redferne.
